object.name: Twisted Records
object.description: Psytrance label based in the U.K, run by famous trance/ambient act Simon Posford.

object.name: Tip World
object.description: Top notch U.K based psytrance label, always been the best!

object.name: News
object.description: Sites containing news on the psychedelic trance scene.

object.name: Trance.net
object.description: Norwegian based news site containing reviews, party information and more. A must visit!
